clauses.title: Assignment of Agreement
clauses.summary: The Owner can transfer the lease agreement at any time without notifying the Resident.
obligations: Resident has no right to be notified of assignment.
risks: Resident may face unexpected changes in management or ownership.
clauses.original_text: The Owner may assign or transfer this agreement at any time without notifying the Resident.

clauses.title: Lease Term and Renewal
clauses.summary: The lease automatically renews for 12 months unless the Resident gives 120 days' notice before expiration.
obligations: Resident must provide written termination notice 120 days before lease expiration.
risks: Resident may be locked into an unwanted lease extension.
clauses.original_text: The lease term begins on the start date listed and automatically renews for additional 12-month periods unless the Resident submits written termination notice at least 120 days prior to expiration.

clauses.title: Rent Payment and Modification
clauses.summary: Rent is due on the first day of each month, and the Owner can change the rent amount with 7 days' notice.
obligations: Resident must pay rent on the first day of each month.
Resident must accept rent changes with 7 days' notice.
risks: Rent increases can occur with minimal notice, potentially causing financial strain.
clauses.original_text: Monthly rent is due on the first day of each month. The Owner may modify the monthly rent amount at any time with written or electronic notice delivered 7 days prior to the next payment due date.

clauses.title: Late Rent Charges
clauses.summary: A $150 late fee is applied if rent is not received by the due date, with an additional $50 daily until full payment.
obligations: Resident must pay a $150 late fee if rent is late.
Resident must pay an additional $50 daily until full payment is received.
risks: High late fees can accumulate quickly, leading to significant financial burden.
clauses.original_text: If rent is not received by 11:59 PM on the due date, a late charge of $150 is applied. An additional $50 accrues daily until full payment is received.

clauses.title: Security Deposit
clauses.summary: The security deposit can be used for various expenses determined by the Owner, including cleaning and maintenance.
obligations: Resident must pay a security deposit before moving in.
risks: Deposit may be retained for broad, unspecified expenses.
clauses.original_text: A security deposit must be paid prior to occupancy. The security deposit may be retained by the Owner for any cleaning, maintenance, repainting, or administrative expenses determined necessary by the Owner.

clauses.title: Maintenance and Repairs
clauses.summary: The Resident is responsible for all maintenance and repairs, including plumbing, electrical, appliances, and structural issues.
obligations: Resident must handle all maintenance and repair tasks.
risks: High maintenance costs could be a significant financial burden.
clauses.original_text: Resident is responsible for all maintenance and repairs to the premises including but not limited to plumbing systems, electrical components, appliances, structural elements, and weather-related damage.

clauses.title: Property Condition
clauses.summary: The Resident accepts the property as-is and the Owner is not obligated to make repairs or improvements.
obligations: Resident must accept the property in its current condition.
risks: Resident may inherit a property with existing issues and no recourse for repairs.
clauses.original_text: Resident accepts the property in its current condition and agrees that the Owner is not obligated to make repairs or improvements after move-in.

clauses.title: Right of Entry
clauses.summary: The Owner can enter the premises at any time without advance notice for inspections, repairs, or other business purposes.
obligations: Resident cannot restrict Owner's entry.
risks: Lack of privacy and potential disruption to Resident's life.
clauses.original_text: Owner or Owner representatives may enter the premises at any time for inspection, repairs, or other business purposes without advance notice.

clauses.title: Utilities and Additional Charges
clauses.summary: The Resident must pay all utility services, maintenance fees, service charges, and operational costs as determined by the Owner.
obligations: Resident must pay all utility and additional charges.
risks: Unexpected charges could lead to financial strain.
clauses.original_text: Resident agrees to pay all utility services connected to the property, including shared building utilities, maintenance fees, service charges, and operational costs as determined by Owner.

clauses.title: Rules and Policies
clauses.summary: The Owner can create or modify property rules at any time, and the Resident must comply immediately.
obligations: Resident must comply with new or revised policies immediately.
risks: Resident may face sudden, restrictive rule changes.
clauses.original_text: Owner may create or modify property rules at any time. Resident agrees to comply immediately with any new or revised policies.

clauses.title: Early Termination
clauses.summary: If the Resident vacates early, they remain responsible for all rent and fees until the lease ends.
obligations: Resident must continue paying rent and fees if they leave early.
risks: Financial burden of continuing rent payments despite vacating.
clauses.original_text: If Resident vacates the premises before the lease ends, Resident remains responsible for all rent and fees owed through the end of the lease term.

clauses.title: Owner's Liability
clauses.summary: The Owner is not liable for personal injury, loss of property, theft, or damages occurring on the property.
obligations: Resident must assume all risks of living on the property.
risks: Resident has no recourse for damages or injuries caused by property conditions.
clauses.original_text: Owner shall not be responsible for personal injury, loss of personal property, theft, or damages occurring on the property regardless of cause.

clauses.title: Renter's Insurance
clauses.summary: The Resident must maintain renter's insurance meeting coverage limits set by the Owner, and the Owner can purchase insurance on the Resident's behalf.
obligations: Resident must maintain renter's insurance.
Resident must pay for insurance purchased by the Owner.
risks: Resident may incur additional costs for insurance.
clauses.original_text: Resident is required to maintain renterâ€™s insurance meeting coverage limits determined by Owner. Owner may purchase insurance on behalf of Resident and bill Resident for all associated costs.

clauses.title: Cleaning and Move-Out
clauses.summary: The Resident must hire approved cleaning services before moving out, and charges may be deducted from the deposit or billed additionally.
obligations: Resident must use approved cleaning services.
Resident may face additional cleaning charges.
risks: Additional costs for approved cleaning services.
clauses.original_text: Resident must hire cleaning services approved by Owner prior to move-out. Charges may be deducted from deposit or billed additionally.

clauses.title: Dispute Resolution
clauses.summary: Disputes must be resolved through arbitration selected by the Owner, and the Resident must pay arbitration costs and waive court rights.
obligations: Resident must use arbitration for disputes.
Resident must pay arbitration costs.
risks: Resident loses the right to a fair court trial and may face high arbitration costs.
clauses.original_text: Any disputes must be resolved through arbitration selected by Owner. Resident agrees to pay arbitration costs and waives rights to court proceedings.
